sources.title: Diamond Run | Full Action Crime Movie
sources.description:
**The film is under non-exclusive license from Artist View Entertainment Inc.  All rights reserved**

Diamond Run - Rogue Vietnam War vets led by their old commander Sloan try to steal some diamonds, but mysterious Megan Marlow steals them first. Sloan sends his men after her, but rogue cop Jack Cates, who's partner was murdered by Sloan, helps her.

1996
Stars: Linda Ljoka, Michael J. Valentine, Sean P. Donahue

Welcome to Movie Central. Subscribe and watch more Awesome Movies.
